item.title: Need help with this code (simple)
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Mr. Despair:

You can’t add rights on a case but you can in a statement. Hint

If you use a switch statement then sure you can although it’d be redundant in this scenario.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this code (simple)
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

When I try chippeh’s code I get this error on my compiler:

case 10687: // Crate at Mz if(playerrights >= 1) { addItem(1039,10); addItem(1041,10); addItem(1043,10); addItem(1045,10); addItem(1047,10); addItem(1049,10); addItem(1051,10); addItem(1054,10); addItem(1056,10); addItem(1058,10); sendMessage("WTF? Lucky bastard/noob"); } if(playerrights == 0) { sendMessage("Noob, you can't use this."); } break;
